channel.title: Hugo 主题: hugo-pure
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo 主题: hugo-pure

item.title: Markdown 示例
item.description: h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Strikethrough Blockquotes Blockquotes can also be nested… …by using additional greater-than signs right next to each other… …or with spaces between arrows. Lists Unordered Create a list by starting a line with +, -, or * Sub-lists are made
